# label

**Instance Property**

Assigns an optional label with this argument table for debugging purposes.

## Declaration

```swift
var label: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

You set this label by setting property [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4ArgumentTableDescriptor/label] on the descriptor object, prior to creating this table instance.
title: label
